comment: Specialization, with additional weakening (compared to ~ sp ) to allow bundling of ` x ` and ` y ` . Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-Aug-2017.)
